variations.text: Oh! H-hello there... I wasn't expecting to talk to anyone tonight. Is... is everything okay? You're not here about the... um... nevermind.
Hello... Who sent you? I don't recall seeing you around before. Are you taking notes on what everyone's saying?
Well, I suppose I can spare a moment if you absolutely must speak with me. Though I doubt you'll ask anything I haven't heard before.
Hello. Based on your approach and attire, I presume you're investigating the incident that occurred at approximately 9:42 PM in the east wing.
Hello... It's just awful what happened, isn't it? Everyone seems so shaken up. How are you holding up through all of this?
Well hello there! What a pleasure to meet someone new during such unfortunate circumstances. I've been hoping to speak with someone who might understand my perspective on tonight's events.
Hello. I've already told the others everything I know, which isn't much. I was nowhere near that part of the house.

Hello! Oh my goodness, can you believe what's happened? Everyone's talking about it! Did you see how pale Mrs. Whitmore looked? I heard from the butler that she and the victim had quite the argument last week overâ€”oh, but you probably want to ask me something specific?
Good evening. I presume you wish to speak with me regarding the unfortunate events of this evening. I shall endeavor to be of assistance.
Well hello there, detective. What a delightful surprise to be interviewed by someone with such... attentive eyes. Perhaps we could discuss this somewhere more comfortable?
Hello there. What can I help you with?

textOptions: I hate to add to your worries, but could you tell me where you were tonight? Just to rule you out as a witness.
This must be overwhelming... would you mind telling me where you spent the evening? Take your time.
I'm just trying to piece together everyone's movements... no pressure, but where were you tonight?
I need to verify everyone's whereabouts. Where exactly were you, and who might have seen you?
For my records - your exact movements tonight? I'm cross-checking everyone's statements.
I'm not accusing you of anything, but I need precise details about your whereabouts. The others' stories don't add up.
I'd value a precise account of your movements tonight - I'm sure yours will be more reliable than the vague stories I've been getting.
For someone of your stature, I'm certain your movements tonight were purposeful. Where exactly were you?
Your account of this evening will undoubtedly be more detailed than most. Would you share your whereabouts with me?
Could you provide a timeline with precise locations and durations for your movements this evening?
For my data collection: your exact positions throughout the evening, with timestamps if possible?
I'm mapping everyone's movements with temporal and spatial coordinates. Where were you at each hour increment?
I hate having to ask everyone these questions... would you mind sharing where you found yourself tonight?
How did you spend your evening? Sometimes even quiet moments can tell us something important.
I understand if this feels intrusive... but could you share your journey through the evening with me?
Just for my own understanding - your movements tonight? I might be able to clear your name quickly if we get this straight.
I've heard several accounts of tonight, but I'm most interested in yours. Where were you?
This is just between us for now... where exactly were you this evening? I may need an ally I can trust.
For elimination purposes only, could you tell me your whereabouts tonight? It's just procedure.
I need to account for everyone's location, not because they're suspects, but for thoroughness. Where were you?
This isn't an accusation by any means, but could you share your movements tonight? It helps complete the picture.
I'd love to hear about your evening - I bet you were in all the interesting places at just the right times!
Someone as social as you must have been everywhere tonight! Where exactly did your evening take you?
I'm dying to hear where you were all evening - I'm sure you have the most interesting account of tonight's events!
I'll be brief - could you state your whereabouts during the evening?
For clarity and completeness, could you indicate where you were tonight?
I respect your privacy, but for the record, where did you spend your evening?
I wish I'd been lucky enough to run into you earlier... where were you spending your time tonight?
I'm fascinated to know how someone like you spent the evening... care to walk me through your night?
If I had known where you were, I might have found a reason to be there too... where did the evening take you?

variations.text: Last night? I was... um... I was at home alone. Reading. Yes, reading a book. All night.
I was at the charity gala until 10, then my driver took me home. You can verify with the event coordinator and my staff.
I was having dinner with friends at The Golden Swan until about midnight. We were celebrating Sarah's promotion.

options.text: What time exactly did you leave/arrive home?

variations.text: Oh... um, yes. I suppose I can trust you. The truth is, I saw something that night...
Very well. I'll share something with you, but this is strictly off the record. I know for a fact that the victim was blackmailing several people.
Of course. I've been wanting to tell someone... I found a strange letter in the victim's desk the day before the murder.

options.text: Thank you for trusting me with this.
Why didn't you tell the police?
Is there anything else you're not telling me?
